roleset.name: not able to be held, endured
roleset.note: UNBEARABLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-6, relation to 'bear.01'. (from unbearable.01-j)

roles.note: arg2 not particularly expected, added for symmetry with verb. (from unbearable.01-j)

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: People are influenced by close associations . If they were not expelled , would n't it be " unbearable " for other " students and parents " ? Who is going to protect their rights ?
